item.title: Notes On Everything
item.description: Statistics Probability Machine Learning Algorithms & Data Structures Python RShiny Inputs & Outputs Inputs textInput() sliderInput() selectInput() numericalInput() dateRangeInput() all inputs have the format __input("inputId", "label", unique_param1, unique_param2, ...) Render Functions Render functions are used to built outputs in the server based on inputs and possibly other stuff renderText() renderTable() renderImage() renderPlot() Output Functions Output functions are used in the ui to display the result built by render functions in the server
